attributes.action: About a travellers site being put in a residential area of Knutsford
attributes.additional_details: We live in this area and do not want our house prices to be lower due to having a travellers site right across the road from our house.
attributes.background: The area they have requested is already used as a lorry park for lots of vehicles.My husband has a family business and they have parked vehicles in this park for over 25 years. Where would they be able to park if this site goes ahead. At present the site is  paid for, do travellers pay for sites ???

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
